Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-22742 affecting package rust for versions less than 1.68.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-22742 affecting package rust for versions less than 1.68.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package rust is earlier than 1.68.0-1, affected by CVE-2023-22742
